column4: ok now it's freezing after I log in. shows a cursor, and the brownish-orange ubuntu thing, and then everything stops responding, caps-lock and all that don't change when I press them
is this a known problem, it freezing after login?
I have no idea how to browse the forums or wiki or anything from a console
I am fairly amazed I managed to remember irssi :(
You do not know how to read web pages?
Will give you access to six consoles.
Did you start linux with runlevel 1?
Let me rephrase: How did you get to where you are now?
Ok, then you probably are at runlevel 1 and have got no multitasking availible.
We're working on it. As intelikey sais. Quit irssi and type openvt -c 2 bash

borked xorg.conf in most cases. Might be a wrongly detected (usb?) keyboard and/or mouse. Might be an USB port that hasn't been reset properly. Might be any number of drivers not working correctly due to mis-detected hardware. Sound might be the problem but I haven't seen a case where it's taken the whole system down.
